response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its worth of $10,000 to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This is an exclusive chance to secure it at a discounted rate, reflecting its immense value and your appreciation for it. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
